description: This file defines puzzle engine protocols and implementations for a word-guessing game platform, including classes for classic and anagram engines, and a helper function for letter feedback computation.

classes.name: Engine
classes.description: Protocol interface for puzzle engines, requiring an evaluate method.

classes.name: ClassicEngine
classes.description: Implements a word-guess engine with Wordle-like feedback.

classes.name: AnagramEngine
classes.description: Implements an anagram puzzle engine with permutation validation.

methods.name: _compute_letter_feedback
methods.description: Computes per-letter feedback (correct, present, absent) similar to Wordle rules.

methods.name: evaluate
methods.description: Method in each engine class to evaluate guesses against a target.
